detail.notificationBody: A pull request event occurred in the following AWS CodeCommit repository: my-new-repository. arn:aws:iam::123456789012:user/admin updated the following PullRequest 201. The pull request was updated with one or more commits to the source branch: refs/heads/my-new-feature. For more information, go to the AWS CodeCommit console https://us-east-1.console.aws.amazon.com/codecommit/home?region=us-east-1#/repository/my-new-repository/pull-request/201
detail.title: My 201st Pull Request
